a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with cancer vs. median age, 1990 to 2021
Estimated share of the population with cancer versus median age.
Average annual change in median age
Average annual change in share of population
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
Note: Non-melanoma skin cancers are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
